@usedefault

h2. Robots

{{datatables_use}}
{{action id:'action-Addrobot' class:'glyphicon glyphicon-plus margin-bottom-medium margin-left-medium' label:'Add robot'}}
{{actions:
- display: Add robot
  action: /restmachine/zrobot/client/add
  hide: true
  input:
    - name: name
      label: Name
      type: text
      required: true
    - name: url
      label: Robot address
      type: text
      required: true
}}
{{robots}}

{% if error is defined %}
Error : ${error}
{% else %}


||Name||URL||
{% for robot in robots -%}
  |[${robot.name}|/ZRGrid/robot?rname=${robot.name}]| ${robot.url} |
{% else %}
  No robots available.    
{% endfor %}
{% endif %}
